name: Red Fracture
description:
The revolution is now! Powered with the latest Unity 3D technology game engine, you will be surrounded by the most realistic environment

Drive a bulldozer and destroy your way around to unlock hidden areas. Collect all 8 plutonium particles and escape from Mars.

Featuring:
• 3 timezones (day, dusk, and night)
• Realistic object physics for mass destruction
• Detailed sky with sunlight glare
• Adaptive object shadowing
• Responsive easy movement and viewing controls
• Explore one of the biggest landscape you will ever play
• High resolution retina support
• Universal application (play on all your devices)


IMPORTANT: To enhance gaming experience, earphones are recommended in order to hear our specifically designed music and sounds. Speaker volume can be an alternative but with sub-optimal effect.
